stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

preGame:
# ‚öæ STEP UP TO THE PLATE, OSTERRA! GAME TWO IS ON THE AIR! ‚öæ

Hello, you beautiful, bloodthirsty bunch! It's your favorite voice of the void, Nok the Corrupter, bringing you the second installment of this history-making Best of 5 series! We are live at **The Unruly Yard** in New Monteforte, and let me tell you, the atmosphere is more volatile than a warlock with a hangover! The Chaos Creatures shocked the world in Game One, and now the Wardens are looking to stop the bleeding! üèüÔ∏è

I just peeked into the dugouts, and the rituals are in full swing! **Ema Ulrick** of Oak & Onslaught is meticulously putting on her left gauntlet before the right‚Äîconsistency is key when you're trying to crush skulls, folks! Meanwhile, for the home team, **Lian Denton** is currently downing a shot of steaming hot gravy from a dented tin cup. That‚Äôs the kind of high-octane fuel that turns a healer into a herald of havoc! ‚òïü•ì

The popularity contest is heavily skewed toward the "heroic" leafy brigade of Oak & Onslaught, but here in the Unruly Yard, the graffiti is fresh and the crowd is hostile! We've got an **Open Bar** tonight, which means the fans are already swaying like the unstable scaffolding holding up the VIP boxes. I saw **Sir Randy** polishing his fancy bow earlier; I hope he brought an umbrella for the inevitable rain of beer and teeth! üçªüèπ

Will the Chaos Creatures keep the momentum, or will the Wardens find their footing in this rebellious district? The series stands at 1-0 for Monteforte. If the creatures win this, the Wardens will be in a hole deeper than the one **Hole Bowerman** digs for her helmet! Let‚Äôs get to the action! üî•üèà
postGame:
# üèÜ THE OAK CRASHES DOWN ON NEW MONTEFORTE! üèÜ

Holy Mackerel, sports fans! What a display of absolute, unmitigated savagery! You‚Äôre listening to Nok the Corrupter, and my demonic heart is practically singing after that performance! Oak & Onslaught have roared back with a vengeance, silencing the Unruly Yard with a crushing 4-1 victory! The series is now deadlocked at one game apiece! üèüÔ∏è‚ú®

The game started with **Ema Ulrick** scooping up the troll head in Center Field, but the Chaos Creatures weren't about to play nice. **Urata Oriana** delivered a tackle to Symer Crissy that sounded like a dry branch snapping under a giant's boot! Symer was hauled off to the healers before the game even had its legs! Talk about a warm Monteforte welcome! üöë

The violence didn't stop there! **Wolbrom Ariella**‚Äîthe scythe-wielding shanty singer‚Äîdecided **Hole Bowerman** didn't need a functioning ribcage, delivering a tackle that sent the Warden lancer straight to the injury list! My goodness, the medical staff is earning their gold tonight, especially with the **Open Bar** making everyone‚Äôs aim a little... adventurous! üç∫üí•

But then, the momentum shifted! **Affra Yanaton** found herself in Center Field with a clear line of sight. She didn't run; she launched a prayer! The trollball sailed through the smoky air of the Yard and‚ÄîSWISH‚Äîa massive **2-point Shoot**! Just like that, the Wardens took the lead, and the rowdy crowd went silent enough to hear a rogue's heartbeat! üéØ

The second half was a literal parade of stretchers! **Placido Kora** leveled Millham Evangeline, but the Chaos Creatures couldn't find the basket. Then, **Boulanger Procto** went on a absolute rampage! He delivered a crunching tackle to **Normi Glaudia** and followed it up by flattening **Teria Ravo**! The injury report is starting to look like a census of the local cemetery! üè•üî®

Despite the Chaos pressure, the Wardens‚Äô luck held firm. **Abner Seidel**, likely fueled by those garish undergarments of his, found a pocket of space in the Home Field. He didn't hesitate, launching another long-range bomb! Another **2-point Shoot**! The scoreboard lit up 4-0, and the Monteforte rebels looked like they‚Äôd just been told they had to pay taxes! üò±üèÄ

I have to mention the state of the players‚Äîwith the open bar flowing, **Wolbrom Ariella** threw a pass so wild it nearly took out a street performer on the sidelines! The ball was rolling around the mud like a greasy pig until **Symer Crissy** managed to scoop it back up. The drunkenness on the field is starting to rival a post-victory party at **Yarp's** casino! üç∫ü•¥

The Chaos Creatures finally found a silver lining late in the match. **Gabriele Klehm**, the ball-kissing staff-wielder, made a break for it. She navigated the unstable scaffolding and the stumbling defenders, diving into the End Zone for a 1-point **Touchdown**! It saved them from a shutout, but it was too little, too late for the rebellion! üèÄüí•

Even in the final moments, the Wardens kept the intensity high. **Abner Seidel** delivered one last bone-rattling tackle to **Alben Diantha**, sending the hammer-man to the healers. It‚Äôs clear the "heroes" wanted to send a message tonight: they aren't going down without a fight‚Äîand they don't mind getting their fancy armor dirty! ‚õìÔ∏è

As the final whistle blew, the scoreboard read Oak & Onslaught 4, New Monteforte 1. The series is tied, and we are headed for a Game Three that promises even more carnage! I‚Äôm sure **Sir Randy** is patting himself on the back, while **Dame Terra Monteforte** is probably trying to hex the referee! üèÜü§ò

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from a Yard full of broken glass and even more broken dreams! Stay violent, Osterra! We'll see you for the tie-breaker! üî•ü§ò
